content:
Unfortunately, I'm unable to create a direct Google Maps link with all the places marked with day numbers. However, you can easily create a custom map yourself using Google My Maps.

Here are the steps to create a custom map:

1. Go to [Google My Maps](https://www.google.com/mymaps) and sign in with your Google account.
2. Click "Create A New Map."
3. Use the search bar to find each location using the provided geocoordinates.
4. Once the location appears, click "Add to map."
5. Click on the location marker, and then click the edit (pencil) icon to change the title to "Day # [Activity Name]."
6. Repeat steps 3-5 for all the locations in your itinerary.

By following these steps, you'll have a custom Google Map with all the places marked with day numbers, making it easy to navigate and plan your trip. Enjoy your time in Dubai and Abu Dhabi!
